rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3889, M6004}
Must have passed 7 (I/W) units in {RTS4101, RTS4102, RTS4103, RTS5101, RTS5102, RTS5103, RTS5110}

time: Second semester 2017 to First semester 2018 (', 'Off-campus Day', ')

description: This unit is a period of professional clinical experience undertaken in the workplace to enable students to develop competency. Students will practice under the supervision of qualified staff, and a clinical workbook will be provided to enable students to document their professional and technical development.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
